name: Pro Fishing: The Fishing Mini-Game Game
name_original: Pro Fishing: The Fishing Mini-Game Game
description:
Created in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare 46 Game Jam Competition!

Can You Catch All The Fish?

Explore The World Of Pro Fishing!
Discover: 
-- 5+ Rods
-- 20+ Lures
-- 30+ Fish
All Over the Span of 4 Unique Regions! Each With Its Own Unique Soundtrack!

How To Play:
1. Aim For The Bubbles
2. Wait For Bite
3. Catch And Sell All the Fish

Controls:
WASD -- Move
Left Mouse Click  -- Place Fishing Rod
Left Mouse Drag -- Aim Fishing Rod
Left Mouse Release -- Launch Fishing Rod
Escape -- Menu
Mouse Wheel Scroll -- Navigate Menu

Credits:
